description:
Mai is a reserved academic girl however, unlike Honoka, she seems to prefer arts to sciences. Her father is an astronomer, her mother is an archeologist and her brother, Kazuya, wishes to follow in his footsteps. She and her family live in an observatory. Her whole name can translate into "The beautiful flying dance".
As Cure Egret, Mai introduces herself as "The Radiant Silver Wing, Cure Egret!"
name: Cure Egret
